column1: "description": "These data provide the 2024 update of the Electricity Annual Technology Baseline (ATB). Starting in 2015 NREL has presented the ATB, consisting of detailed cost and performance data, both current and projected, for electricity generation and storage technologies. The ATB products now include data (Excel workbook, Tableau workbooks, and structured summary csv files), as well as documentation and user engagement via a website, presentation, and webinar. Starting in 2021, the data are cloud optimized and provided in the OEDI data lake. The data for 2015 - 2020 are can be found on the NREL Data Search Page. The website documentation can be found on the ATB Website.",
"description": "Here the objectives of the ATB are explained in detail along with additional information about ATB.",
"description": "This website can be used to search NREL data. To find 2015-2020 ATB data, search for ATB. ",

"description": "AWS public dataset program registry page for data released under the Department of Energy's (DOE) Open Energy Data Initiative (OEDI). The registry page contains information about dataset documentation, access, and contact, for each of the OEDI Data Lake datasets.",

"description": "ATB Electricity Database in the OEDI Data Lake on AWS. Here, ATB electricity data can be found in CSV and parquet files for 2019-2024. The data lake only contains the most up to date versions of these files.",
"description": "Github documentation for the ATB that includes data documentation, model information, the structure of the directory, and other useful information regarding ATB data. ",
"description": "OEDI Data Demonstration on how to access and visualize the 2024 ATB electricity data from AWS S3 storage. ",

"description": "This workbook contains cost and performance data for renewable and conventional technologies. This workbook's purpose is to present a technological baseline each year in order to inform electric and transportation sector analysis in the United States.",
"description": "Tableau workbooks include selected data for chosen technologies from the ATB workbook. The files included in the archive are .twbx files which are compatible with XML. ",

"description": "This workbook contains cost and performance data for renewable and conventional technologies. This workbook's purpose is to present a technological baseline each year in order to inform electric and transportation sector analysis in the United States.",
"description": "Tableau workbooks include selected data for chosen technologies from the ATB workbook. The files included in the archive are .twbx files which are compatible with XML.",

"description": "Workbook for version 3 of the data. This workbook contains cost and performance data for renewable and conventional technologies. This workbook's purpose is to present a technological baseline each year in order to inform electric and transportation sector analysis in the United States.",
"description": "Parameters used in the ATB model pertaining to version 3 data.",

"description": "Tableau workbooks for version 3 of the data include selected data for chosen technologies from the ATB workbook. The files included in the archive are .twbx files which are compatible with XML.",
"projectTitle": "Technology Integration, Power Sector Annual Technology Baseline (ATB)",
"title": "2024 Annual Technology Baseline (ATB) Cost and Performance Data for Electricity Generation Technologies"
